name: Progression || Degeneration
description:
This game is heavily inspired by The Binding of Isaac. You walk around kill things and that's about it. 

I made this game for Ludum Dare 42. I didn't have any ideas I liked for the actual theme, so I just made my game based on the decay and evolve themes. 

Had to cut 50% of what I made due to bugs... so no final boss. 

If you want to support me/the future of the game follow me on 

youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTF55vLsfcuI2epJShoZa0Q

(I will make a video talking about my experience with ludum dare 42)

twitter: https://twitter.com/TheJustinSix

I had to learn how to do every little thing as I made the game, as I didn’t have real prior experience.
